div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

nav.div: Laredo Independent School District » Coronavirus Updates

span.style: letter-spacing: -0.0558333px; font-family: Poppins, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);

div.span: The safety and well-being of our children is always of utmost importance. That is why Laredo ISD is taking extra precautions to protect our school community from the coronavirus (COVID-19). LISD is working closely on a daily basis with the City of Laredo Health Department for the latest information. Our custodial staff is trained to disinfect campuses on a daily basis with products to help offset the spread of communicable illnesses such as the influenza.

br.span: The following links provide important information to protect you and your families from the coronavirus:
